mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL , R.REPLY_ID , R.BOARD_ID , R.EMAIL , R.CONTENT , R.CRT_DT , R.MDFY_DT , R.RECOMMEND_CNT , R.PARENT_REPLY_ID , R.DEL_YN , M.NAME FROM REPLIES R INNER JOIN BOARD B ON R.BOARD_ID = B.ID INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON R.EMAIL = M.EMAIL START WITH R.PARENT_REPLY_ID = 0 AND R.BOARD_ID = #{_parameter} CONNECT BY PRIOR R.REPLY_ID = R.PARENT_REPLY_ID WHERE R.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT R.REPLY_ID , R.BOARD_ID , R.EMAIL , R.CONTENT , R.CRT_DT , R.MDFY_DT , R.RECOMMEND_CNT , R.PARENT_REPLY_ID , R.DEL_YN , M.NAME FROM REPLIES R INNER JOIN BOARD B ON R.BOARD_ID = B.ID INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON R.EMAIL = M.EMAIL WHERE R.REPLY_ID = #{_parameter} AND R.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLIES (REPLY_ID , BOARD_ID , EMAIL , CONTENT , CRT_DT , MDFY_DT , RECOMMEND_CNT , PARENT_REPLY_ID , DEL_YN) VALUES (SEQ_REPLIES_PK.NEXTVAL , #{boardId} , #{email} , #{content} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 0 , #{parentReplyId} , 'N')
